topics.body:
[spoiler]The naming conventions of the Demons in Gash Bell are weird. You've got demons with wierd yet sane names like Gash and Tio. You've got the really out there ones like Brago, Kyanchome, Zophise and Zeon. And then there's Ted.
!fc00.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2010/018/0/5/Ted_from_Zatch_Bell_by_J_Mac09.jpg!
His name. Is. TED.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
